name: Sonarr Dark / night mode
description:
Dark gray theme for the PVR system Sonarr.
Just install the style: no need to modify URL if you are using the default port (8989).

user.name: massiliattak
user.about: I am a french Star Citizen. If you've ever heard about this game and wish to earn 5000 credits, then follow this link (it's free!).
